definition: فريق farīq pl. فروق furūq, افرقة afriqa, افرقاء afriqā2 band, company, troop, detachment, unit; party; faction; team (sports); - a military and naval rank, approx.: lieutenant general (Eg.), vice admiral (Eg.) │ فريق اول (awwal) lieutenant general (Ir.); فريق ثان (tānin) major general (Ir.)
